segments.text: Excuse me , do you know where the visa office is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . I ’ ll walk you there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you applying to study or work abroad ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you want to study ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope to study English Literature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you got your visa yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not yet . I have an interview with a visa official today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see.Is it your first interview ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I ’ Ve already been here for 3 interviews .
segments.speaker: S1
